title: Best hotel experience
text:
Coming from Miami to new york city for pleasure and business often I always stay at the Waldorf, Peninsula or the Hilton mid and upper east side but wanted to try something different and treat myself to a suite so I was refer to Trump hotel by a friend in real state business.
I'm so glad I did.
I was welcome by a such friendly staff from the door man, butler and front desk including the manager.
My experience exceeded my expectations.
The view, the suite, the complimentary little stuff, the staff, everything spotless in the room.
All my requests were fulfilled.
The pool was awesome and very big gym and spa dowstairs.
Manager came to my room to ask if I needed anything as well as the maid and the butler and received a call from front desk to let me about my late check out and if I needed anything else.
My friend and I were treated like Quees.
Never experience this kind of treatment at the other hotels I stayed.
My journey was short at trump hotel but sweet.
I will definitely return on my next trip to NYC and will highly recommend it to others as a well satisfied customer.
Location for tourist visiting is perfect, price is right for a suite and sleeps 3/4, subway right next to hotel broadway along side as well as central park,time square, shopping etc
Thank you for making my day on march 12/13 and see you all soon.
